from django import forms

class BMICalculatorForm(forms.Form):
    height = forms.FloatField(label='Height')
    weight = forms.FloatField(label='Weight')

from django.db import models

class BMIResult(models.Model):
    bmi_value = models.FloatField()
    bmi_category = models.CharField(max_length=20)
    interpretation = models.TextField(blank=True)
    health_advice = models.TextField(blank=True)
